unit.description: Unit in which this product is sold

active_flag.description: Whether this product will be made active or not.
active_flag.title: numberBooleanDefault1

selectable.description: Whether this product can be selected in Deals or not.
selectable.title: numberBooleanDefault1

visible_to.description:
Visibility of the product. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.
ValueDescription
`1`Owner & followers (private)
`3`Entire company (shared)

owner_id.description: ID of the user who will be marked as the owner of this product. When omitted, the authorized user ID will be used.

prices.description: Array of objects, each containing: `currency` (string), `price` (number), `cost` (number, optional), `overhead_cost` (number, optional). Note that there can only be one price per product per currency. When `prices` is omitted altogether, no prices will be set up for the product
